title: Pearl Harbor episode 3: Countdown to the raid
itunes:title: Pearl Harbor episode 3: Countdown to the raid
itunes:subtitle: In the latest episode in our new series on the raid on Pearl Harbor, Steve Twomey speaks to Ellie Cawthorne about the immediate run-up to the attack, revealing how inch-perfect Japanese planning and complacent oversights by American military figures co...
description:
In the latest episode in our new series on the raid on Pearl Harbor, Steve Twomey speaks to Ellie Cawthorne about the immediate run-up to the attack, revealing how inch-perfect Japanese planning and complacent oversights by American military figures combined to leave Pearl Harbor naval base a sitting duck for Japanese bombers.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
itunes:summary:
